fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Construct a Nubian pyramid in the center of town.
- Give all Civs Rampage for the night. (Costs 9 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Nubian pyramids take two nights to build.
- You cannot act while the pyramid is being built.
- Nubian pyramids last for one night once they are built.
- Everyone who visits someone more than three houses away is considered to have passed by the pyramid.
- You generate 2 gold for all non-Civs who pass by the Nubian pyramid.
- You can only give Civs Rampage on the night that the Nubian pyramid is active.
- Passively generate 2 gold each night.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were slain by a Nubian archer.” (Factional Kill)
“Your pyramid is under construction.” (Second night)
